name: Themes & Issues in History
description: This is a thematic survey course addressing issues of gender, class, ethnicity, religion, war, economics and political strife through broad-sweep coverage of a region’s history. Prepares students for upper-level study through exposure to eyewitness primary sources and conflicting secondary interpretations of events. Consult http://history.utoronto.ca/undergraduate/fw-courses/ for exact prerequisites and for specific content of the course.
prerequisites: Varies according to particular course offering. See History website for information.
